mapper.select: select pr.PACKET_ID as id, pr.PACKET_TRACE as trace, pr.PACKET_REF_ID as ref_id, p.PACKET_TRACE as ref_trace, p.PACKET_TIME as ref_time, p.PACKET_STATUS as ref_status, p.PACKET_REPOID as ref_repo_id from wms_packet_ref pr, wms_packet p where pr.PACKET_REF_ID = p.PACKET_ID

select pr.PACKET_ID as id, pr.PACKET_TRACE as trace, pr.PACKET_REF_ID as ref_id, p.PACKET_TRACE as ref_trace, p.PACKET_TIME as ref_time, p.PACKET_STATUS as ref_status, p.PACKET_REPOID as ref_repo_id from wms_packet_ref pr, wms_packet p where pr.PACKET_ID = #{packetID} and pr.PACKET_REF_ID = p.PACKET_ID

select pr.PACKET_ID as id, pr.PACKET_TRACE as trace, pr.PACKET_REF_ID as ref_id, p.PACKET_TRACE as ref_trace, p.PACKET_TIME as ref_time, p.PACKET_STATUS as ref_status, p.PACKET_REPOID as ref_repo_id from wms_packet_ref pr, wms_packet p where pr.PACKET_TRACE = #{packetTrace}
